activities:
Peruvian Connection is a retail fashion catalog.  Orders are taken for UK and EU customers in the UK call center, via phone, fax, mail and web.
All customer data including name, address, credit card information is securely transmitted to the main server in the US.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, Address, Phone, E-mail, Credit Card
privacyprograms:
DMA SafeHarbor Program
Vendors handling any customer information for Peruvian Connection are also certified for Safe Harbor
recoursemech: We agree to cooperate and comply with the EU and/or Swiss data protection authorities for human resource information, and the DMA Safe Harbor Program for EU and/or Swiss customer information
